Title: Relates to enacting the "budgeting for opioid treatment in New York act"
Summary: Enacts the "budgeting for opioid treatment in New York act" which provides for an excise tax of one cent per milligram on prescription opiates and establishes the opiate addiction trust fund to provide funding for addiction treatment, prevention and recovery programs.
LawCode: Add Art 20-C §§495 & 496, Tax L; add §89-j, St Fin L
